description: The Tupolev Tu-14T is a torpedo bomber. The NATO reporting name is Bosun.
notes: Bomb system is ballistic (-1) if doing level bombing from four or more altitude levels above the target.

Tail Guns. In addition to its fixed guns, there aircraft has a tail mount with two 23 mm NR-23 guns. It can fire into the 60- arc. It may return fire twice per game turn in response to a gun attacks or conduct a single attack. Roll to hit is 3/2/1 and no modifiers apply except target size. The AtA rating is 4. The ammunition is 6.0.
Tail gunner has no ejection seat and can only bail out.
loadnotes: Station 1 is the internal bomb bay. Load options are: (a) two FAB-1000 2,200 lb bombs, (b) four FAB-500 1,100 lb bombs, (c) six FAB-250 550 lb bombs, (d) sixteen FAB-100 225 lb bombs, or (e) two anti-ship torpedoes. Any bombs carried must be low-drag.
Torpedoes can only be launched from T-level at a speed of 2.5 or less. Both may be launched at once.
